name: Blood 2B Rich
description:
Donate blood, get rich!

Attention, take care of your mental and physical health

You're in your room donating blood, every blood bag full, you make money and with it you can buy upgrades and cosmetics

Controls:
Wait: Get money
Mouse: Buy stuffs
Esc: Pause game

"Do not give your life too much to the point of not having one more"
